articles.title: Kourtney Kardashian misses late dad Robert on Father's Day but makes no mention of Scott Disick - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 43-year-old Poosh founder posted seven snaps of the late lawyer, but she did not acknowlege her 39-year-old ex or her stepfather Caitlyn Jenner
articles.content:
The Kardashians star Kourtney Kardashian Barker honored her late father Robert Kardashian Sr. on Father's Day with seven Instastories.
The 43-year-old Poosh founder was 24 when the lawyer died, age … [+4480 chars]

articles.title: BTS Lands Sixth No. 1 Album on Billboard 200 Chart With ‘Proof’ - Billboard
articles.description: Plus: Carrie Underwood scores her 10th consecutive top 10 on the Billboard 200 with 'Denim & Rhinestones.'
articles.content: BTS’ new compilation album Proof debuts at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 chart (dated June 25), garnering the pop group its sixth chart-topper. The retrospective – consisting mostly of previously releas… [+6572 chars]
